text: Ewald Schurer (15 April 1954 – 2 December 2017) was a German politician. He was born in Ebersberg, Germany. He was a member of the SPD. Schurer died on 2 December 2017 at his home in Ebersberg, at the age of 63.Süddeutsche Zeitung, 3.
